h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Second Encounter)
content: This spell can be swapped out with Immobilize, providing a more defensive variant on temporarily neutralizing enemies. With it, you'll be able to create a small limited barrier for yourself, which can be essential when preparing for a tough fight and using consumables and heals, or removing chilling effects.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
This spell can be swapped out with Immobilize, providing a more defensive variant on temporarily neutralizing enemies. With it, you'll be able to create a small limited barrier for yourself, which can be essential when preparing for a tough fight and using consumables and heals, or removing chilling effects.
